rl.photoviewer.controller

Class ControllerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.photoviewer.controller.ControllerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, Controller

    public class ControllerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Controller, which delegates all calls to another controller if available. It allows to replace the controller in charge at runtime.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
